entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [.NET 9.0 Regression] "Credentials supplied to the package were not recognized" when using certificates with wcf client #110067
  • .NET 9 refuses to run any application on my system #110065
  • Deadlock in GC when attached profiler calls ICorProfilerInfo4::EnumThreads using .NET9 runtime #110062
  • SingleFile Bundler should use the managed Mach-O signer #110055
    10.0.0
  • UnsafeAccessor does not work for generic constructors, .NET 9 #110054
  • Stock Blazor standalone app with AOT compilation enabled fails to load in up-to-date Chrome when the host OS is Linux #110056
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: #110052
  • [API Proposal]: Like WebApplicationBuilder allow us to put a finished IConfiugration instance into a HostBuilder #110051
    Future
  • Matrix4x4.CreateReflection gives incorrect results in .NET 9 #110050
  • [wasm] Run Wasm.Build.Tests across .NET versions #110049
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Json reference handling allow per-type customization #110048
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: IndexOf extension method on IEnumerable<T> #110045
  • SPMI: TFM should not be hardcoded for microbenchmark collections #110043
    Future
  • System.Reflection.Emit doesn't work on linux and wsl ubuntu #110042
  • Test failure: JIT/jit64/hfa/main/testE/hfa_sf1E_r/hfa_sf1E_r.cmd #110040
  • Request to Update Target Framework for Microsoft.Extensions.AI.Abstractions #110039
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT failed with VS2022 17.12.1 Professional #110038
  • `wasm` not support the FrameworkReference of `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App` #110036
  • Globilization country list only returns 2 characters and not the full name #110035

Closed

  • LoggerMessageAttribute and EventID inconsistency with non-code generated logging. #110021
    Future
  • Breaking Change in .NET 9.0.0 causes incorrect behavior of TypeScript Compiler running with Jurassic #110004
  • ILC: Add property for target processor tuning #108540
  • Calling instance-based methods with function pointers is not supported #110061
  • cmov not being used in nested hand-unrolled loop #109940
  • ios-arm64 helix queue: Failed to list devices #110008
  • Cross-OS native compilation is not supported. #109284
  • Application Build with sdk .NET9 rc-1 and .NET9 rc-2 were not working in Azure app service(Linux) #109212
  • Native AOT doesn't include new core lib APIs provided by NuGet packages #105274
    10.0.0
  • OleDB has crashes and access violation exceptions when using databases in specific versions of 64 bit MSAccess #109995
  • SseFormatter internal buffer doesn't grow properly and throws #110028
    10.0.0
  • MailAddress accepts invalid email address with consecutive dots #109590
    Future
  • StackAlongDimension does not return correct result #108615
    10.0.0
  • Inconsistent DeflateStream output between .net8 and .net9 #110041
  • Crash with "munmap_chunk(): invalid pointer" error #106738
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Detect and handle imprecision in 3-opt layout cost computation #110069
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enlarge stack overflow handling helper stack #110068
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove 2 more casting helper method frames #110064
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use the managed signer to remove the code signature from singlefile bundles #110063
    area-Single-File, area-HostModel, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #110060
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110059
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110058
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Matrix4x4.CreateReflection when D is not zero #110057
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #110053
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, 9.0.x
  • Fix BufferExtensions.Write to specify sizeHint to GetSpan #110047
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host

Merged

  • JIT: Fix JITDUMP null dereference during value numbering #110066
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve containment for widening intrinsics #109474
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Make contracts tests use mock/placeholder target instead of actual target #110027
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Arm64-SVE: Fix up comments in optimizemaskconversions #109955
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #109763
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • JIT: Replace `BlockSet` with `BitVec`, and remove BB epoch #110034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #108620
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #109988
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • threads.h: Fix up grammar/spelling in vm/threads.h #109972
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • MailAddress accepts invalid email address with consecutive dots #109690
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Small clean up in assertionprop for relops #109987
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete pragma suppression for warning disabled with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #110030
    area-System.Net
  • Replace DAMT.All with more restricted annotation on InvokeMember/FindMembers/DeclaredMembers #109801
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix PooledByteBufferWriter handling of sizeHint <= 0 #110031
    area-System.Net
  • Update DynamicallyAccessedMembers annotation on EventSource #110001
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Propagate static readonly loads by value during inlining #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add GFNI Intrinsics #109537
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't use a GVM in Linq Select with NAOT by default #109978
    area-System.Linq, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: Force using LDAP V3 for SASL binding #109450
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove some `fgRenumberBlocks` calls #110026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adds Linux CMake presets for coreclr #110029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #109891
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109990
    area-System.Threading
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Automate dl 9 0 #109291
    area-Workloads, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #109332
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix return address hijacking with CET #109548
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Disable GS cookie checks for LightUnwind #109530
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add forwarding support for WasmLinkage on LibraryImport #109364
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109186
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add a missing = in BigInteger.cs #109732
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix regression in constructor parameter binding logic. #109813
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.x
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109845
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109844
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] `TensorPrimitives` XML docs: `MinNumber`/`ReciprocalSqrt`/`ReciprocalSqrtEstimate` oversights #109922
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix transformer handling of boolean schemas in JsonSchemaExporter. #109975
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix handling of IDynamicInterfaceCastable wrt CastCache #110007
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109989
    area-System.Threading
  • [Tests] Add more logging for runtime test timeouts #109998
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #109977
    bug, area-System.DirectoryServices, regression-from-last-release, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use reaching definitions in CSE to update conservative VNs #109959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #109920
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Suppress IL3000 in MsQuicApi constructor #109965
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • SPMI: Switch back to unpinned 9.0 SDK for micro benchmarks #109992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] WebSocket stress #108770
    area-System.Net
  • Add numerical ordering option for string comparison operations #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #109996
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
